abstract: Pfizer said that it had licensed the worldwide rights to a treatment for Gaucher disease, a genetic disorder, putting Pfizer into competition with Genzyme.
snippet: Pfizer said that it had licensed the worldwide rights to a treatment for Gaucher disease, a genetic disorder, putting Pfizer into competition with Genzyme.
lead_paragraph: The world’s largest drug company is thinking small.

headline.main: Pfizer Deal Signals a Move Into Treating Rare Diseases
headline.print_headline: Pfizer Deal Signals a Move Into Treating Rare Diseases
